startingPosition.instruction: Lie flat on the back. Legs together and straight. Arms by the sides and palms down. Head, neck and spine in a straight line.

technique.instruction: Raise the right leg 5cm from the ground, keeping the knee straight. Other leg should remain straight and in contact with the floor.
Rotate the entire right leg clockwise 5 times in as large a circle as comfortable.
Rotate the entire right leg anti-clockwise 5 times in as large a circle as comfortable.

info: Inhale while moving the leg upwards.
Exhale while moving the leg downards.

technique.instruction: Raise the left leg 5cm from the ground, keeping the knee straight. Other leg should remain straight and in contact with the floor.
Rotate the entire left leg clockwise 5 times in as large a circle as comfortable.
Rotate the entire left leg anti-clockwise 5 times in as large a circle as comfortable.

info: Inhale while moving the leg upwards.
Exhale while moving the leg downards.
Deep breathing should be done and movement should be in sync with the breathing.
Gently push out the abdomen with inhalation and exhaling return to the starting position. Repeat 5 times.
